<https://gerrit.hyperledger.org/r/#/c/2737/7>
<https://gerrit.hyperledger.org/r/#/c/2753/6>

could use a little help.  they have enough +2's but needed to be rebased
<@U0PB67X4K> <@U0XPR4NP4> humble request ? :slightly_smiling_face:  can the above be held off till I submit the chainid’s byte->string CR ? it touches order and other files
perhaps easier to rebase the above for Jason

Hi <@U0YNFB22X>, I’m trying to get more attention to these. Noting that some of these have been out there for a while.

<https://gerrit.hyperledger.org/r/#/c/1117/> Added support for TLS in java shim		
<https://gerrit.hyperledger.org/r/#/c/1927/> Allow deploying Java chaincode from remote git repo		
<https://gerrit.hyperledger.org/r/#/c/1929/> Add support for Maven build in java chaincodes		

Please can you respond to the review(s) quickly, so that we can get these in (in full or in part)?
